Senior Software Engineer - Cloud Infrastructure

Company: TechCorp Inc.
Location: Remote (US)

About the Role:
We're seeking an experienced Senior Software Engineer to join our Cloud Infrastructure team. You'll be responsible for designing, building, and maintaining scalable cloud-based systems that power our products used by millions of users worldwide.

Required Skills:
- 5+ years of professional software development experience
- Strong proficiency in Python and/or Go
- Extensive experience with AWS services (EC2, S3, Lambda, RDS, CloudFormation)
- Expert-level knowledge of Docker and Kubernetes
- Experience building and maintaining CI/CD pipelines (Jenkins, GitLab CI, GitHub Actions)
- Infrastructure as Code expertise (Terraform, CloudFormation)
- Strong understanding of networking, security, and system architecture
- Experience with monitoring and observability tools (Datadog, Prometheus, Grafana)

Soft Skills:
- Excellent communication and collaboration abilities
- Strong problem-solving and debugging skills
- Ability to mentor junior engineers
- Self-motivated and able to work independently
- Experience working in Agile/Scrum environments

Responsibilities:
- Design and implement highly scalable cloud infrastructure solutions
- Build and optimize CI/CD pipelines for rapid deployment
- Ensure system reliability, performance, and security
- Collaborate with cross-functional teams (product, design, QA)
- Write clean, maintainable, and well-documented code
- Participate in on-call rotation for production support
- Mentor junior team members and conduct code reviews
- Stay current with emerging technologies and best practices

Qualifications:
- Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field (or equivalent experience)
- AWS certification (Solutions Architect or DevOps Engineer) preferred
- Experience with microservices architecture
- Knowledge of security best practices and compliance requirements

Nice to Have:
- Experience with other cloud providers (Azure, GCP)
- Background in Site Reliability Engineering (SRE)
- Contributions to open-source projects
- Experience with GraphQL APIs
- Familiarity with Machine Learning infrastructure

Company Culture:
We value innovation, collaboration, and continuous learning. Our team is fast-paced, supportive, and committed to delivering high-quality solutions. We offer competitive compensation, comprehensive benefits, and opportunities for professional growth.
